postData.contentHtml:
Since the tracker gets updated everyday, it started to be really busy and not entirely usable anymore. The new version aim to clean up redundant data, and only show information when it changed.

Original view:

New view:

Model3 also added many new trim, which were not all displaying. This would still need some improvment to make it dynamic, but the current version works.
postData.title: Tracker update
